recipe.title: Kumquat and Cranberry Compote
ingredients: 9 oz kumquats, trimmed and quartered lengthwise (1 1/2 cups)
2 tablespoons finely chopped peeled fresh ginger
instructions: Stir together all ingredients in a 4-quart heavy saucepan and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until berries have burst, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove star anise and cool completely.
